text: These are the divisions which Eleazar the priest divided by lot, and Joshua the son of Naue, and the heads of families among the tribes of Israel, according to the lots, in Selo before the Lord by the doors of the tabernacle of testimony, and they 19. 51 Heb. finished dividing. The LXX seems to have read הלך for חלק.went to take possession of the land.
